title: Portfolio Page with Project Grid
description:
Implement Complete Portfolio Project Showcase Page

Create a fully responsive portfolio section that displays project cards in a dynamic grid layout, showcasing completed work with comprehensive details and interactive elements.

Requirements:
- Design and implement responsive grid layout that adapts across breakpoints (desktop: 3-4 columns, tablet: 2 columns, mobile: 1 column)
- Create 6-12 individual project cards, each containing:
  - Optimized thumbnail image (consider WebP format with fallbacks, lazy loading, proper aspect ratios)
  - Project title/name
  - Brief project description (2-3 sentences)
  - Technology stack tags or badges
  - Call-to-action links (live site URL, GitHub repo if applicable)
- Implement engaging hover effects for desktop users (e.g., image zoom, overlay transitions, shadow elevation)
- Ensure mobile-optimized touch targets (minimum 44x44px tap areas per WCAG guidelines)
- Add smooth transitions and animations that don't impact performance
- Optimize all images for web delivery (compression, appropriate dimensions, responsive images with srcset)
- Ensure semantic HTML structure for accessibility
- Implement keyboard navigation support for interactive elements
- Test grid behavior with varying content lengths (long titles, short descriptions, etc.)
- Verify layout integrity across major browsers and device sizes
- Consider loading states for images and content
- Optionally add filtering or sorting functionality by technology or project type
